name: Best Friends Forever (itch) (Gerben Pasjes)
description:
It is the final day of summer, which is always a bummer. But before the sun truly makes place for clouds and rain, in the middle of the Hundred Isle Lake a birthday party is about to begin. On the cards the names of the friends made this season.

Made in 48 hours during the Global Game Jam 2022. Theme: Duality

Credits: Niels Leenders, Steff Kempink, Arnoud Poll Jonker, Tom Hoesstee, Daniel Torkar, Gerben Pasjes
